    • Method Detail

      • beginComponent

        void beginComponent(java.lang.String name,
                    IUIComponentMetadata metadata)
        Starts the component rendering
        Parameters:
        name - Component name
        metadata - IUIComponentMetadata of the component

      • beginComponent

        java.lang.String beginComponent(java.lang.String name,
                                ClipboardPage metaPage,
                                java.util.Map configMap)
        Starts the component rendering
        Parameters:
        name - Component name
        metaPage - Clipboard Page of the component
        configMap - instanceid: Unique instance id class: html class on the root marker (optional)
        Returns:
        Returns the page ref

      • beginComponent

        java.lang.String beginComponent(java.lang.String name,
                                ClipboardPage metaPage,
                                java.lang.String componentUniqueId,
                                java.util.Map configMap)
        Starts the component rendering
        Parameters:
        name - Component name
        metaPage - Clipboard Page of the component
        componentUniqueId - component unique id
        configMap - instanceid: Unique instance id class: html class on the root marker (optional)
        Returns:
        Returns the page ref

      • endComponent

        void endComponent()
        Ends the rendering. It has the responsibility of arranging templates in the UI Tree

      • abortComponent

        void abortComponent()
        Aborts the rendering

      • getLocation

        java.lang.String getLocation()

      • setTrackedProperties

        void setTrackedProperties(java.lang.String[] trackedProperties)
        Pass the list of component specific absolute property references to be registered with the change tracker e.g. pyCells().pyValue pyCells().pyModes().pyStyleNameOther
        Parameters:
        trackedProperties -

      • setChildPathReference

        void setChildPathReference(java.lang.String childPathRef)
        holds the value to insert the next child apart from pyTemplates e.q, pySection.pySectionBody(1). pyCells(1) output will be pyTemplates(0).pySection.pySectionBody(1).pyCells(1).pyTemplates(0)
        Parameters:
        childPathRef -

      • isTemplate

        boolean isTemplate()
        Determines whether component is template or not. In case of template, special processing can be done. eq., Donot add entry to the tree or make other page.
        Returns:
        boolean value.

      • isCurrentRootsRequire

        boolean isCurrentRootsRequire()
        Determines whether component should hold the current roots. Example: RDL require pyCurrentRoots property to process the children templates.
        Returns:
        boolean value.

      • isActionable

        boolean isActionable()
        Determines whether component can be refreshable or reloaded independently. eq., Section, Layout, Cell etc.,
        Returns:
        boolean value.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the component name.
        Returns:
        component name.

      • addPreLoadScript

        void addPreLoadScript(java.lang.String aHtmlFragment,
                      java.lang.String aOnlyOnceName)
        API to add component specific scripts
        Parameters:
        aHtmlFragment - - html fragment name which has to include
        aOnlyOnceName - - pega only once name, pass this if html fragment needs to be included only once. If passed null then html fragment is included always

      • getDefaultPropertyValueMap

        StringMap getDefaultPropertyValueMap()
        Returns the Map of key value pair to avoid the defaults to be register with change tracker. While registering with change tracker default properties will be ignored if value matches to the tracked properties. Here, key will be the property name and value will be default value of the property. eq., key: pyFormatName value: Standard
        Returns:
        Map of key value pair.

      • isUIComponentRendered

        boolean isUIComponentRendered()

      • setDefaultPropertyValueMap

        void setDefaultPropertyValueMap(StringMap nonTrackedProperties)
        While registering with change tracker default properties will be ignored if value matches to the tracked properties. Here, key will be the property name and value will be default value of the property. eq., key: pyFormatName value: Standard
        Parameters:
        nonTrackedProperties - StringMap of key value pair.

      • getUniqueHash

        java.lang.String getUniqueHash()
        Returns the unique hash bound to the component. Example: In case of section, sectionUniqueHash will be used.
        Returns:
        hash.
